titleStmt.title: Reflections on a libel, intituled, A plea for the Apothecaries

notesStmt.note: A reply to a pamphlet, by Henry Stubbs (Stubbes or Stubbe) issued anonymously, London, 1671, with title: Medice Cura Teipsum!, or The apothecaries plea.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
